translation: All of this world is pervaded by Me in My unmanifest aspect; all beings exist within Me, but I do not dwell within them.
commentary: 9.4 Maya by Me? Tatam pervaded? This is this? Everything all? Jagat world? by the unmanifested form? exist in Me? Sarvabhutani all beings? Not not? f and? I'm I? in them in them? avasthitaá¸¥ placed.Commentary Avyaktamurti is Para Brahman or the Supreme Unmanifested Being invisible to the senses but cognizable through intuition. All beings from Brahma? the Creator? down to the blade of grass
